title: Two arrested after child shot
content:
WATERLOO – Bond has been set at $252,000 for a Waterloo man charged in a Thursday night shooting that injured a child.
Mar’yo Doyuan Lindsey Jr., 21, of 2100 Weis Court, is charged with willful injury causing bodily injury, going armed, carrying weapons, intimidation with a weapon and felon in possession of a firearm.
